author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-3861: Refactor SolrCoreState so that it's managed by SolrCore.

author: sergeyb
msg: CXF-4528: change the logging severity in WebApplicationExceptionMapper when
the app has a FaultListener that actually asked for logging.
[CXF-4528] More updates to the mapper, if fault listener has handled the exception - do not log, otherwise do log either at warning (default) or fine level
[CXF-4528] Making simpler to customize the error message and optionally including it with Responses
